TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel printTicketLevel, int32 sequence) cil managed

Docs.param: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.

Based on the scope of defined by , the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"> class.
Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
Docs.value: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Setting the CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>. If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> event.
Docs.value: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the CurrentPrintTicketLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>. For other CurrentPrintTicketLevel values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
Docs.value: The number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the Sequence property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>. For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the Sequence property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
